text:
On 12/10/2024 at 07:02 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 07:10 AM)
Subject:SAAS backcountry
I’ll review the invoices and pay the larger amount.
There are some other documents that need to be completed that I will be sending over.
I also have the whistler place for the weekend and plan to take the boys. I’ll send over the travel authorization as well.
Message 76 of 287
Ok. I am offering for us to do it. I want to turn over a new leaf. I have said that I will work with you. I don’t want to disrupt plans and think we can
figure something reasonable out that benefits the children. Are you just refusing to take that offer for peaceful resolution?
Sent:12/10/2024 at 11:23 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 05:48 PM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
On 12/10/2024 at 11:04 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 11:20 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
I pulled from mid winter break language. I understood all breaks start after school.
We can have our lawyers resolve this quickly on when Winter break should start.
On 12/10/2024 at 10:51 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 10:57 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
I'm sorry. I honestly don't see that. And that would be double dipping, right? You want both weekends too? Either way, if you don't mind:
• Please drop that text into the thread, no attorneys are needed
• Let's create a workable solution together, I can flexible here
On 12/10/2024 at 10:43 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 10:43 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
The plan we signed says Winter Break starts after school on Friday until the Sunday.
On 12/10/2024 at 10:08 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 10:37 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Attachments:Winter_Break_2024.jpg (141 KB)
I don't want to argue, either. And you went straight to the lawyers in this instead of even asking if we could work together. That mode won't
help us unless Natalie is on a permanent retainer, so you can always go after me. I am suggesting a path forward of compromise and solutions.
